General.Name: Beijing Bashi Media Co Ltd
General.Description: Beijing Bashi Media Co., Ltd. engages in the media, automobile services, and investment and financing businesses. It also provides car rentals, car sales and maintenance, and scrapped vehicle dismantling and recycling services. The company was formerly known as Beijing Bus Co., Ltd. Beijing Bashi Media Co., Ltd. was founded in 1999 and is based in Beijing, China. Beijing Bashi Media Co., Ltd. is a subsidiary of Beijing Public Transport Holdings (Group) Ltd.
